video_title: Follow the gut feeling ðŸ™Œ do you agree? #mindset #advice #shorts
transcript:
if you get a gut feeling about someone
or something make sure that you trust it
here's the reason why we're taught in
our society to follow our minds but our
minds were actually developed in the
womb after our heart so our heart our
gut feeling usually knows the path first
and the Brain catches up to it and so if
you get a feeling about someone good or
bad that something is right or something
is wrong make sure that you follow it
even if it logically makes sense to go a
different direction if you follow your
gut feeling you follow your heart it
always knows first it usually just takes
time for the brain to catch up
